data.title: British Monarchs and Their Spouses: from the Windsors to the Tudors
data.meta_description: Queen Elizabeth II married Prince Philip of Greece - 20 November 1947 King George VI married Lady Elizabeth Bowes-Lyon - 23 April 1923 King Edward VIII - abdicated the throne in December 1936 to marry twice-divorced Wallis Simpson - 3 June 1937 King George V married Princess Mary of Teck - 6 July 1893. She…
data.text:
Queen Elizabeth II married Prince Philip of Greece – 20 November 1947

King George VI married Lady Elizabeth Bowes-Lyon – 23 April 1923

King Edward VIII – abdicated the throne in December 1936 to marry twice-divorced Wallis Simpson – 3 June 1937

King George V married Princess Mary of Teck – 6 July 1893. She was originally engaged to his brother Prince Albert, who was second-in-line to the British throne. He died six weeks after their engagement and she later became close to his brother

King Edward VII married Princess Alexandra of Denmark – 10 March 1863

Queen Victoria married Prince Albert of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha – 10 February 1840

William IV married Princess Adelaide of Saxe-Meiningen – 13 July 1818

George IV married Princess Caroline of Brunswick – 8 April 1795 (link to Royal Collection)

George III married Princess Charlotte of Mecklenburg-Strelitz – 8 September 1761

George II married Princess Caroline of Ansbach – August 1705

George I married* Sophia Dorothea of Celle – November 1682 *divorced prior to George’s succession

Queen Anne married Prince George of Denmark – 28 July 1683

Queen Mary II married William III of Orange and ruled jointly – 4 November 1677

James II married Anne Hyde – 3 September 1660

James II married Mary of Modena – 20 September 1673

Charles II married Catherine of Braganza – 21 May 1662

Charles I married Princess Henrietta Maria – 11 May 1625 (by proxy) and in person on 13 June 1626

James I and VI married Anne of Denmark – 20 August 1589 (by proxy) 9 September 1589 and in person 23 November 1589

Elizabeth I – no spouse

Mary I married Prince Philip II of Spain – 25 July 1554

Lady Jane Grey married Guildford Dudley – 25 May 1553 (queen for 9 days)

Edward VI – no spouse

Henry VIII married* Katherine of Aragon – 11 June 1509 *Katherine of Aragon was his brother’s widow

Henry VIII married Anne Boleyn – 25 January 1533 (approx)

Henry VIII married Jane Seymour – 30 May 1536

Henry VIII married Anne of Cleves – 6 January 1540

Henry VIII married Katherine Howard – 28 July 1540

Henry VIII married Katherine Parr – 12 July 1543

Henry VII married* Elizabeth of York – 18 January 1486 *this united the warring Houses of Lancaster and York effectively ending the Wars of the Roses

Henry VIII family tree from the National Archives

Disclaimer: Whilst I have made every effort for accuracy, these dates have been taken from internet sources and not verified with original documents. They are fine for a general ball-park date, but if you are writing something that needs verifiable dates, please access archival sources.
